posts.title: Migrating from Medium to my own blog
posts.html:
If you end up seeing this, welcome! You're a bit early to the party as this is currently work-in-progress while I work on my new blog setup.

FYI, since you're here, it's built with:

  • Ghost v3 (www.ghost.org)
  • Svelte & Sapper (www.svelte.dev)
  • Tailwind CSS (www.tailwindcss.com)
  • Google Cloud Platform, particularly Cloud Run (www.cloud.run) and Cloud Storage - possibly Firebase Hosting before I launch the blog.

posts.meta_title: Migrating from Medium to my own blog
posts.meta_description: Why I moved from Medium to my own blog post - and how you can too.
